text: int main ( void ) { int a [ 99 ] [ 99 ] ; int x ; int t = 0 ; int i = 0 , j = 0 ; int max = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & x ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < x ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( j = x - 1 ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { for ( i = 0 ; i <= j ; i ++ ) { a [ j ] [ i ] += a [ j + 1 ] [ i ] > a [ j + 1 ] [ i + 1 ] ? a [ j + 1 ] [ i ] : a [ j + 1 ] [ i + 1 ] ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < x ; i ++ ) { if ( max < a [ i ] [ i ] ) { max = a [ i ] [ i ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; max = 0 ; } return 0 ; }
